summary.para: Marshals an interface from data stored in the stream.

param.name: riid
param.para: Interface identifier of the interface to marshal.

param.name: ppv
param.para: Receives a pointer to the requested interface. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

summary.para: Stores the data needed to marshal an interface across a process boundary.

param.name: riid
param.para: Interface identifier of the interface to marshal.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

summary.para: Marshals an interface pointer to and from a stream.
Stream objects that support IStream can expose this interface to provide custom marshaling for interface pointers.
